channel.title: ~Noname Server Development Post~
channel.description:
__________________________________________________________________________________________________________________________________________________________ ~Noname Server Development Post~ __________________________________________________________________________________________________________________________________________________________ We dont have a name atm since we want to focus on developing other than just talking.
[center][b]Development log:[/b][/center]
[center][b]Staff Team:[/b] [size=10pt]Owner: [/size][size=9pt]Quackie (Spec = ?)[/size] [size=10pt]Coders: [/size][size=9pt]Nickog15 (Spec = ?)[/size] [size=9pt]Frankpetrov (Spec = ?) Lil_Smok3r (Spec = Non-Combat) STILL NEED ONE MORE CODER AND 2 SUGGESTORS[/size][/center]
Update log [code] 6/14/12:Started Coding[/code]
Pictures: [IMG]http://i.imgur.com/AqVWy.jpg[/img]
We are still recruiting NEW members for our team! Coders and Suggestors! Here is the link: http://www.moparisthebest.com/smf/index.php/topic,547569.0.html Btw cant update the development log cuz im busy and just suck... But i'll try and get myself to do it later.

item.title: ~Noname Server Development Post~
item.dc:creator: @imsuperman05 imsuperman05
item.description:
@imsuperman05 wrote:

[quote=“AtomicInt_, post:3, topic:445138”][quote author=Whackatre link=topic=547827.msg4017554#msg4017554 date=1339763881]

  1. I think you’re pretty dedicated to this project, keep it up. c:
  2. Fixing your compiler isn’t really an update…
  3. MoparScape links are allowed, why wouldn’t they be?
  4. Try to work on actual server content rather than commands.
  5. There will always be bugs, no matter what you do.
  6. Try cleaning up your thread as it is hard to read.
  7. Do not post pointless updates. (i.e N3W C0MMANDZ, etc)
  8. It IS a rule to post some sort of media in your development topic, do so.
  9. Good luck!
    [/quote][/quote]
    Any sort of changes made to the development is very relevant, and not pointless, it’s the little things that can mess up a source/program and should be logged.

@OP
Y U STEAL MY NAME?!

Read full topic

item.title: ~Noname Server Development Post~
item.dc:creator: @Quackie Quackie
item.description:
@Quackie wrote:

[quote=“AtomicInt_, post:3, topic:445138”][quote author=Whackatre link=topic=547827.msg4017554#msg4017554 date=1339763881]

  1. I think you’re pretty dedicated to this project, keep it up. c:
  2. Fixing your compiler isn’t really an update…
  3. MoparScape links are allowed, why wouldn’t they be?
  4. Try to work on actual server content rather than commands.
  5. There will always be bugs, no matter what you do.
  6. Try cleaning up your thread as it is hard to read.
  7. Do not post pointless updates. (i.e N3W C0MMANDZ, etc)
  8. It IS a rule to post some sort of media in your development topic, do so.
  9. Good luck!
    [/quote][/quote]1.Thanks
  1. Ok deleting after posting this.
  2. It said that links werent allowed but i didnt know about Mopar links.
  3. Well we needed ::item to get the things to try out the server.
  4. I know but you can atleast fix alot of em.
  5. You mean the things under “Development log:” ? I know thats pretty bad but i dont know another way.
  6. I didnt have anything to add so…
  7. Ok adding after i post this.
  8. Thanks!

Read full topic
